remarks: If two sets have the same vertices and the same edges, one set is a hypergraph iff the other set is a hypergraph, deduction form. (Contributed by AV, 18-Jan-2020.)
statement:
uhgeq12d.v $e |- ( ph -> ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` H ) ) $.
uhgeq12d.e $e |- ( ph -> ( .ef ` G ) = ( .ef ` H ) ) $.
uhgeq12d.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. X ) $.
uhgeq12d.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. Y ) $.
uhgeq12d $p |- ( ph -> ( G e. UHGraph <-> H e. UHGraph ) ) $.
